Journal.Title: Physical medicine and rehabilitation clinics of North America
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Phys Med Rehabil Clin N Am

Article.ArticleTitle: Fatigue in Post-Acute Sequelae of Coronavirus Disease 2019.

Abstract.AbstractText: Fatigue from post-acute sequelae of coronavirus disease 2019 is a complex constellation of symptoms that could be driven by a wide spectrum of underlying etiologies. Despite this, there seems to be hope for treatment plans that focus on addressing possible etiologies and creating a path to improving quality of life and a paced return to activity.
